gobblin.runtime.job_catalog

Class FSJobCatalog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • gobblin.runtime.job_catalog.ImmutableFSJobCatalog
        • gobblin.runtime.job_catalog.FSJobCatalog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service, JobCatalog, JobCatalogListenersContainer, MutableJobCatalog

    public class FSJobCatalog
extends ImmutableFSJobCatalog
implements MutableJobCatalog
    The job Catalog for file system to persist the job configuration information. This implementation has no support for caching.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

        com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.Listener, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.State

    • Method Detail

      • put

        public void put(JobSpec jobSpec)
        Allow user to programmatically add a new JobSpec. The method will materialized the jobSpec into real file.
        Specified by:
        put in interface MutableJobCatalog
        Parameters:
        jobSpec - The target JobSpec Object to be materialized. Noted that the URI return by getUri is a relative path.

      • remove

        public void remove(URI jobURI)
        Allow user to programmatically delete a new JobSpec. This method is designed to be reentrant.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface MutableJobCatalog
        Parameters:
        jobURI - The relative Path that specified by user, need to make it into complete path.

      • shouldLoadGlobalConf

        public boolean shouldLoadGlobalConf()
        It is InMemoryJobCatalog's responsibility to inform the gobblin instance driver about the file change. Here it is internal detector's responsibility.
        Overrides:
